name: Yatra
description: Crew on a holy trip to Kumbh Mela at Allahabad (now Prayagraj). Here the water is from Ganges-Yamuna-Sarasvati rivers confluence.  Kumbh Mela is celebrated in a cycle of approximately 12 years, to celebrate every revolution Jupiter completes and thus the pilgrims gathered in massive numbers and here one of the rituals includes a sacred dip in the river.
